summary: This is a forwarded email chain regarding the 'MCC New York Camera Project,' which appears to be a contract or project awarded in September, with the sender expressing surprise that they were not informed. The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting potential relevance to surveillance, security, or facility management at the Metropolitan Correctional Center where Epstein was held.

events.title: MCC New York Camera Project Awarded
events.description: A project referred to as the 'MCC New York Camera Project' was awarded, but the sender of the email indicates they were not informed about it.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: The email discusses the 'MCC New York Camera Project,' which was awarded in September of an unspecified year.
The sender expresses surprise, stating 'I guess this awarded in Sept and no one told me lol,' indicating a lack of communication about the project.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting a possible connection to surveillance or security at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was detained.
